welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Planegg, Germany! Known for its picturesque scenery and charming Bavarian architecture, we invite you to immerse yourself in our city's beauty and discover all it has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fuerstenfeldbruck Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Franz Josef Strauss Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Franz Josef Strauss Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but users must register and agree to terms and conditions before use.
